name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TestChimp - Generate UI & API Automation Tests From Session Recordings

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture UI + API activity during testing sessions. Easily convert them to automation tests with no code.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TestChimp is a powerful no code platform for building user journey API tests & UI Tests from manual test sessions.

This chrome extension captures UI + API activity during manual tests, which are automatically exported to your TestChimp account. You can then easily build automation tests from those recordings, and collaborate with other testers / devs in your team

1) Build Multi-Step API tests in one-click from manual test sessions

TestChimp analyzes the payloads observed to auto-suggest assertions and variables to define, enabling one-click creation of user journey API tests, making test creation a breeze.

2) Generate UI test scripts easily

TestChimp watches the UI replay to extract user interactions and the context it occurs in, to write code using intelligent locators. It analyzes key UI transitions to write meaningful assertions automatically, resulting in robust and thorough tests. 

The generated tests can be exported as Playwright, Cypress or Selenium scripts, or run directly on TestChimp cloud.

3) Share bug reports / sessions easily with TestChimp Permalinks

Tired of uploading bulky video files to Jira tickets / reports etc. Going back and forth with devs to communicate more context and troubleshoot? Each session captured by TestChimp gets a unique permalink - ideal for linking in bug reports, and sharing with devs for troubleshooting - without needing bulky video uploads.

4) Simplified Exploratory Testing with TestChimp Context Menu Add-ons

Want to input test credit card numbers? Invalid urls? A large text? TestChimp extension adds convenient access to common edge cases, valid / invalid inputs for quicker exploratory testing. It also adds dynamic value support such as current date,  random values etc. You can select any text and add them as a custom vocabulary item, giving easy access to commonly used domain specific inputs for your systems.
